00036 class CorrelationThread : public QThread {
00037 
00038 
00039 public:
00040   //Only the method getCorrelations of CorrelationView has access to the private part of CorrelationThread,
00041   //the constructor of CorrelationThread being private, only this method con create a new CorrelationThread
00042   friend CorrelationThread* CorrelationView::getCorrelations(QValueList<Pair>* pairsToCompute,QValueList<int> clusterIds);
00043 
00044      inline ~CorrelationThread(){};
00045   inline QValueList<Pair>* triggeringPairs(){return clusterPairs;};
00046   inline const QValueList<int>& triggeringClusters(){return clusterIds;};
00047 
00049   inline void stopProcessing(){haveToStopProcessing = true;};
00050 
00051   class CorrelationsEvent;
00052   friend class CorrelationsEvent;
00053 
00054   inline CorrelationsEvent* getCorrelationsEvent(){
00055     return new CorrelationsEvent(*this);
00056   };
00057 
00063   class CorrelationsEvent : public QCustomEvent{
00064    //Only the method getCorrelationsEvent of CorrelationThread has access to the private part of CorrelationsEvent,
00065    //the constructor of CorrelationsEvent being private, only this method con create a new CorrelationsEvent
00066    friend CorrelationsEvent* CorrelationThread::getCorrelationsEvent();
00067 
00068   public:
00069     inline CorrelationThread* parentThread(){return &correlationThread;};
00070     inline ~CorrelationsEvent(){};
00071 
00072   private:
00073     CorrelationsEvent(CorrelationThread& thread):QCustomEvent(QEvent::User + 300),correlationThread(thread){};
00074 
00075     CorrelationThread& correlationThread;
00076   };
00077 
00078 protected:
00079     void run();
00080 
00081 private:
00082     inline CorrelationThread(CorrelationView& view,Data& d,QValueList<Pair>* pairs,QValueList<int> clusterIds):correlationView(view),data(d),haveToStopProcessing(false){
00083       clusterPairs = pairs;
00084       this->clusterIds = clusterIds;
00085       start();
00086     };
00087 
00088     CorrelationView& correlationView;
00089     Data& data;
00090     QValueList<Pair>* clusterPairs;
00091     QValueList<int> clusterIds;
00093     bool haveToStopProcessing;    
00094 
00095 };
